Uses of Class
core.Curve3.Knot3

  • Packages that use Curve3.Knot3 
    Package Description
    core  

    • Uses of Curve3.Knot3 in core

      Methods in core that return Curve3.Knot3 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.alignHandles​(Vec3 foreDir, Vec3 rearDir, Vec3 foreScaled)
      Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.alignHandlesBackward​(Vec3 foreDir, Vec3 rearDir, Vec3 foreScaled)
      Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.alignHandlesForward​(Vec3 rearDir, Vec3 foreDir, Vec3 rearScaled)
      Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.clone()
      Creates a new knot with the coordinate and handles of this knot.
      static Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.fromPolar​(float angle, float radius, float handleMag, Curve3.Knot3 target, Vec3 temp0, Vec3 temp1)
      Creates a knot from polar coordinates, where the knot's forehandle is tangent to the radius.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.get​(int i)
      Gets a knot from the curve by an index.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.getFirst()
      Gets the first knot in the curve.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.getLast()
      Gets the last knot in the curve.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.mirrorHandles​(Vec3 temp)
      Mirrors this knot's handles.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.mirrorHandlesBackward​(Vec3 temp)
      Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.mirrorHandlesForward​(Vec3 temp)
      Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.removeFirst()
      Returns and removes the first knot in the curve.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.removeLast()
      Removes and returns the last knot in the curve.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.reverse​(Vec3 temp)
      Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.rotate​(float radians, Vec3 axis)
      Rotates this knot around an arbitrary axis by an angle in radians.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.rotateX​(float radians)
      Rotates this knot around the x axis by an angle in radians.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.rotateY​(float radians)
      Rotates this knot around the y axis by an angle in radians.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.rotateZ​(float radians)
      Rotates this knot around the z axis by an angle in radians.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.scale​(float scale)
      Scales this knot by a factor.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.scale​(Vec3 scale)
      Scales this knot by a non-uniform scalar.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord)
      Sets the coordinate, fore- and rear-handles to the input coordinate.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float zFore, float xRear, float yRear, float zRear)
      Sets the knot's coordinate, forehandle and rearhandle by component.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.set​(Curve3.Knot3 source)
      Sets this knot from a source knot.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.set​(Vec3 coord, Vec3 foreHandle, Vec3 rearHandle)
      Sets this knot from a series of vectors.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.translate​(Vec3 v)
      Translates this knot by a vector.
